## Peer-reviewed journal articles

```{r}
#| label: articles
articles <- get_collection(
  user = Sys.getenv("ZOTERO_ID"),
  key = Sys.getenv("ZOTERO_KEY"),
  collection = Sys.getenv("ZOTERO_ARTICLE")
)

bib_list(articles, "article")
```
